To a creature who'll never Do better than crawl?

en: Of all the cruel bastards Who've badgered and battered me,

所有那些狠心的小人都曾欺侮打击我

en: You are the cruelest of all!
Rob me of anger and give me despair!

抢走我的怒火给我无奈

en: Tenderness I cannot bear!
So please torture me now With your "Sweet Dulcineas" no more!
zh: 请现在用你的美妙的女人来折磨
请现在虐我你的甜蜜多情女已经
请用你甜蜜杜尔西内娅折磨我吧

en: I am no one! I'm nothing!
zh: 我是没有任何人我是一个什么都没有的人

en: I'm only Aldonza the whore!
And I go my merry way
With my razor and my leeches
I can always earn my pay
You will need me soon I know
For the Lord protects his barbers,
And He makes the stubble grow.
zh: 他让那一些残留的草木再长出来

en: If I slip when I am shaving you
And cut you to the quick,
'Cause I also heal the sick.
Never seen thee or touched thee.
But known thee with all of my heart.
Half a prayer, half a song,
Thou hast always been with me,
Though we have been always apart.
Dulcinea... Dulcinea...
I see heaven when I see thee, Dulcinea,
zh: 见到你的时候我见到了天堂
我看见天堂看见你杜丽西娜
当我看见你时我看见了天堂
我看见天堂看见你杜西妮娅
我看见天堂见你时杜西妮娅
我看见天堂你在那啊哈夏花

en: And thy name is like a prayer
If I reach out to thee,
Do not tremble and shrink
Let my fingers but see
Thou art warm and alive,
And no phantom to fade in the air.
I have sought thee, sung thee,
Dreamed thee, Dulcinea!
Now I've found thee,
The Golden Helmet of Mambrino!
Too long hast thou been lost to glory,
Golden Helmet of Mambrino
There can be no hat like thee!
zh: 这世界上没有一顶像你的帽子
这世界再也没有如你一样的礼帽

en: Thou and I now, ere I die now,
Will make golden history!
In the cuckooberry tree...
I suggest that you agree...
And will not make him bold and brave...
Well, at least he'll find it useful
If he ever needs a shave!
Thou Golden Helmet of Mambrino,
Thy deeds the world will not forget,
Now Don Quixote de La Mancha,
Tear out my fingernails one by one, I like him!
zh: 一个一个撕掉我的指甲我
一个一个撕破指甲我喜欢
一个一个扒下我的指甲我

en: I don't have a very good reason,
Since I've been with him, Cuckoo-nuts have been in season...

en: But there's nothing I can do,
Chop me up for onion stew,
zh: 把我剁成碎末熬成味美的葱油汤

en: You can barbecue my nose.

One pair of arms is like another

I'll go with you or with your brother
It's all the same, it's all the same.
This I have learned:
No man will bum with special flame,
zh: 没有人能用特别的火来与他们同床

en: You'll prove to me before the night's out,

I'm only thinking of him!

Oh, I deadly love my uncle,
But for what he's done to me,
I would like to take and lock him up
And throw away the key!
But  if I do... but  if I do...
That I swear will still be true...

I have to know

little bird, little bird,

nothing will harm you
my words will warm and calm you.

with you, beside you,
